title: The End of Year Prestige Shop is Open!

replies.body: is it just me? the prestige store has a bug?{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}  i saw the Prestige Ahri Animated Emote for 25PP an hour ago. now it is no longer in the PP shop. umm?
I still don't see it {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Same...
yea I don't see it either
Must be sold out {{sticker:leblanc-funny}}
Same been waiting for it to show back up since I saw it earlier before I went out but even after restarting the client twice it is not there
Yeah, Ahri emote is still missing. Allegedly it will be back next week?
Yeah, I own it and it just seems to have vanished from the Prestige store.

Prestige was a mistake. The stuff in the shop is basically worthless and not worth how much prestige points are worth. Previous event skins should have come back because those are what people actually want. I grinded, spent more time on that than school/work, hoping prestige skins would be available once again. Downvote me, but it's just not fair to the majority of us who were either not on at the time or taking a break. I previously heard rumors that they were going to bring back the skins. I'm curious as to what changed your mind. Garena keeps rereleasing prestige skins over there so why not here? Run by different people, I know, but what makes it any different? They promised it was an event exclusive over here? I could easily just switch to Garena servers but I am not making a second account after all I've spent already.

Not only that brother/sister, But I would also like to purchase old event chromas to which would be pretty neat. Or even LV Qiyanna. I really would have liked the Project Zed Chroma. (Forgot the unique name) That or even the Principle Yuumi Chroma. These things are quickly forgotten but I would like a chance to recieve them again! I agree that some people (Such as myself) were not playing at the time certain events were happening...{{sticker:cass-cry}}

I was thankfully there for LV Qiyanna (though had no idea it was worth tokens and I had already gotten the prestige point bundle so I had to spend extra) so I completely understand why people want that skin so much, especially with the actual LV merch being way too much for most of us to even afford, we at least have a somewhat reasonable priced skin. I missed out on Prestige Lux due to not knowing how prestige worked and while I did get the Yuumi bundle at the time, I was not able to get her formal chroma because at the time had no idea about the formal chromas being exclusive (along with prestige lux).

And like it's been stated in the past about them wanting to "respect our investments" I literally do not care if prestige Qiyana comes back. I just want everyone to be happy and enjoy playing the game. This community is amazing and I love you all.

But yes I'm glad some of you are speaking up about chromas because some event ones I own the skins now months later (even if I was there for the events) and would like the chromas I can't get. I'm a chroma collector as well. My friends and I even if we have different skin lines always try to match up chromas when we can lol.

I said this in another comment but I get up at 6:30am, work from 8:30 to 5, and get home at 6. Then I have to walk the dog, socialize, do errands, cook, spend time with family, etc. etc. I still managed to get Prestige Kai'sa.

Prestige skins are special because they're hard to get and only for a certain time period. Those who actually tried to get them were rewarded for it, so I don't see how you think it's "unfair." Isn't it MORE unfair that you want these skins to be re-released because then the original people who worked for it just wasted their time...
Cause Riot is a money hungry company

looks like everyone is getting downvoted lol. anyways, i feel like they should make these events less of a grind... maybe double the points so everyone can grind at their own pace rather than trying to get enough points for just the prestige skin and maybe one chroma by the end of the event. pretty much every game now has some grindable event... but this games grind is just too much work for very low reward (might be called prestige, but it just looks like a recolor to be honest).

I played my ass off for Prestige Kai'sa. The hours were tough since I have a 830-5:00 job, but in the end it was worth it for me because I barely see people with the skin. The whole point of prestige is to have a few people own it, so it makes it more valuable. The only annoying thing is that people can just buy the prestige points, but I guess that also makes it "prestige."

To be honest I will never grind that hard again for another prestige skin, so maybe you do have a point, but I really don't want these skins to be easily obtained. These are purposefully meant to be hard to obtain (unless you're rich) so I'm also OK with Riot saying "If you don't want the prestige skin, then don't work for it..." Makes sense to me.
Its... not in game yet.. So its not released.
It's def in-game. Restart your client. Click the prestige tickets in your loot to find the shop.
It's a shame we couldn't Unlock prestige event skins from this Year, Like how can you offer the Icons and bags for those events but not the skins?
I was thinking the same thing. My buddy wanted the irelia skin but had to work in another state so he couldn't play the event.
Because people grinded/ paid for those skins, so releasing them later on would devalue all the work people did
but they plan to do it next year. so it literally makes no sense.

Makes perfect sense. People this year grinded for skins they imagined would never come back, therefore Riot doesn't bring them back so that it's fair to those who played under that impression. 

2020 Prestige skins you'll know ahead of time whether or not they'll come back for prestige points or will be event-exclusive, so nobody loses out and you'll know whether or not you should grind during the event or just save up until the 2020 Prestige shop.
And I grinded for prestige points and not the skin like a fool. Who's to say I put no effort in hoping it would come back? How is that fair?

Actually they stated it somewhere before that the skins MIGHT come back at the end of the year for people who missed it. It was in some Q&A or a tweet when people were trying to figure out how PP worked.
Except Riot Games has done this multiple times before when they brought back dozens of Limited Edition skins they said would "never come back." How is that any different?

>  How is that any different?

Because you didn't grind for the skins. Prestige skins and regular limited time skins are different, and the LoL community fully acknowledges this when they complain about the grinding aspect of it, but suddenly they're the same thing now?

> [{quoted}](name=Kruton,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=d5dH0kMW,comment-id=0004000000030000,timestamp=2019-12-13T15:31:29.769+0000)
>
> Because you didn't grind for the skins. Prestige skins and regular limited time skins are different, and the LoL community fully acknowledges this when they complain about the grinding aspect of it, but suddenly they're the same thing now?

Many people didn't grind for Prestige skins either. You can spend money to get the tokens, thus your point isn't really valid.

what can you say about people who grinded for 2200 tokens to buy prestige points? they deserve as much as if not more, that Icon wasn't even optional, u were forced to get it with the prestige points.
well they grinded for it and it says it comes with it sooooo
I want to buy Mecha Kingdoms Garen Prestige edition but I'm assuming that is going to be apart of the 2020 collection... :(

> [{quoted}](name=shinosenshi,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=d5dH0kMW,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-12-12T20:47:23.363+0000)
>
> I want to buy Mecha Kingdoms Garen Prestige edition but I'm assuming that is going to be apart of the 2020 collection... :(

Of course it's going to be a part of the 2020 collection, the skins will be released in 2020
Thought they would make all the 2019 event prestige skins available through the shop at the end of it, disappointed :(
They long since said that wasn't happening.

I would argue they didn't state it clearly enough. It definitely wasn't stated in the client.

Same thing with the Twisted Treeline removal. It had been mentioned in a post Riot made but a lot of players didn't know it was happening because nothing in client alerted them.
I just love spending a lot more money on prestige points and event passes only to not be rewarded unless I play more league than a highschool student is possible of doing
they wonder why so many people leave after playing urf... its because they get tired from all these grinding events!

Man I usually side with the LoL community but you guys are absolutely ridiculous right now and sound SO entitled. People do not play League to grind for a skin. How is THAT the reason people quit after URF? You make it sound like Prestige skins should be easily accessible and is the whole point of league. No, they're a minor thing and purposefully made hard to get. If you don't think you can get it, then just ignore prestige skins.

The little points and tokens we get during events are neat, but if that's THE reason anyone here plays League, then that sounds kind of stupid IMO. They're literally freebies and every now and then you get enough to spend them. I barely pay attention to them because they are not a major part of league...
I appreciate this comment.

I had cancer during prestige kaisa worlds event 2018 and was undergoing chemotherapy during that time couldn't play all that much. Sucks that older prestige aren't available I would love to get that skin{{champion:145}}
You can still get them as a very small drop chance from chests / rerolls.
i had to take care of my mom during the trials event so i couldnt get lux. seriously riot didnt ya know some ppl have lives?

hey riot your players are unhappy. youre making some horrible decisions based on reasoning a lot of players dont agree with. set it to a vote. let peoples voices be heard.

fix it. my home got broken into and all my possessions stolen during the kaisa event, i didnt even get to play the game or anything. 

now im basically shit out of luck for something...YOU ARE DOING NEXT YEAR? the drop rates in chest for it are pathetic, and i have the prestige points. youve got my money. at least let me spend it on something i want, rather than be forced to throw them away on grab bags.
When will I be able to purchase the Prestige lee sin skin with my already owned PP?
you can't, it's been stated to be an event pass skin and is in the token shop for 2000

{{champion:55}} aight so so kda kaisa prestige is not coming back yeh? and the garen skin wont be on the 2019 prestige points thing so i can just spend the 103 tokens i got right now xD? just curious and dont wanna make an oopsies i regret later ^_^ got all the skins except miss fortunes and kaisa not that i care much about kaisa just would be cool for the collection :3
Dont spend it yet before February,  they might put them back again.

Do you know for sure? I'm saving mine just in case... but I hear people have heard they might bring them back but I would like to know the source. Prestige Lux is the only skin I want in the game at this point. Was even thinking about cosplaying it but if I dont even own the skin that kinda ruins the point in cosplaying it... I also wanna know because I've already wasted money on loot and well obviously I haven't gotten it and I can't just buy loot until I get it unless I had every skin in the game...
^_^ a lux main hello :) tell your brother i said hi <3{{champion:55}} {{sticker:katarina-love}}
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t8_AY-6W6tE&feature=youtu.be&t=127 :3 time stamp hehe
